title: WOW!
review: Wow that was one of the craziest moives i have ever seen i dont easily get scared but i deffiantely almost cryed i recomend this movie it was great and well thought out everything about the movie was great and  well made.

title: Alright
review: Ok i was hoping for a better movie then i find out that its really not about him, eminem is a great actor no lie but come on already that movie left everything open at the end so many unanswered questions.  but let me say the battles were great.  hollar!
